forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens to a pleasant mosaic of mostly sunny skies, brushed lightly by the soft caress of a west-southwest wind. Today’s high temperature will settle near a comfortable 67 degrees, inviting residents to step outside and bask in the relatively gentle warmth. While the light breeze adds a refreshing touch, expect the temperatures to gradually drop to around 64 in the afternoon, a reminder of the city’s ever-shifting temperament. 

As the sun climbs higher, the clarity of the day will display itself, though whispers of clouds loom in the evening, casting a veil over the night with lows around 57. A delicate dance of winds with gusts reaching up to 20 mph might usher in a subtle chill. One might consider light layers: perhaps a breathable sweater over a tee, ideal for navigating both sunlit streets and the encroaching coolness of dusk. And with such a backdrop, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to a cozy café beckons, offering a perfect sanctuary to sip coffee while watching the world drift by, as the fog gently lingers in the distance, cradling the skyline like a hushed secret.
